plot: A suspended cop ends up in Calgary searching for a criminal, where he falls in love with daughter of a successful Indian businessman and a protective father who takes a while to accept his future son-in-law.
title: Aapko Pehle Bhi Kahin Dekha Hai
plot_es: A suspended cop ends up in Calgary searching for a criminal, where he falls in love with daughter of a successful Indian businessman and a protective father who takes a while to accept his future son-in-law.
original_name: Aapko Pehle Bhi Kahin Dekha Hai
